sources.title: The Liberator | Full Movie | UK Action Crime
sources.description:
The Liberator - Martial arts fueled adventure as Ben Silver aka The Liberator has only a few hours to retrieve a priceless stolen antique and return it undamaged to his mysterious female client, reformed cat burglar, Melinda Page.
2017.  Stars: Ben Lettieri, Keith Chanter, Daniel Jordan
